function:
def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    
    Thought 2: The absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance can also capture the imbalance in distance distribution.
    New Feature 2: distance_difference | distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance - Right-Distance)
    
    Thought 3: The ratio of Left-Weight to Right-Weight can provide insights into the weight distribution.
    New Feature 3: weight_ratio | weight_ratio = Left-Weight / Right-Weight
    
    Thought 4: The ratio of Left-Distance to Right-Distance can provide insights into the distance distribution.
    New Feature 4: distance_ratio | distance_ratio = Left-Distance / Right-Distance
    
    Thought 5: The absolute difference between the sum of weights on each side (Left-Weight + Right-Weight) can also capture the overall weight distribution difference between sides.
    New Feature 5: total_weight_difference | total_weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight + Right-Weight)
    
    Thought 6: The absolute difference between the sum of distances on each side (Left-Distance + Right-Distance) can capture the overall distance distribution difference between sides.
    New Feature 6: total_distance_difference | total_distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance + Right-Distance)
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Distance'] - df_output['Right-Distance'])
    
    # Calculate the ratio of Left-Weight to Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_ratio'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] / df_output['Right-Weight']
    
    # Calculate the ratio of Left-Distance to Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_ratio'] = df_output['Left-Distance'] / df_output['Right-Distance']
